function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for COVID-19 infection cases in the office workplace","Impact":"Lockdown of the entire building or area for cleaning and disinfecting","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict health and safety protocols, regular testing, and vaccination","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, contactless access control systems, and smart sensors for monitoring occupancy and air quality","People":"Office workers, visitors, and cleaning staff","Owner":"Office management and facility maintenance team"}]}
